amendment.description: To provide a reserve fund for the Family Opportunity Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 164 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 164 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) To provide a reserve fund for the Family Opportunity Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 164 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 164 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Grassley.
